item.title: Dr. Muhammad Aslam Jarwar
item.description:
I am a senior research fellow with The PETRAS National Centre of Excellence for IoT Systems Cybersecurity at the Department of Science, Technology, Engineering, and Public Policy (STEaPP) , University College London. I have developed and led various domestic and international projects. I am the author of over dozen peer-reviewed articles and ITU-T technical recommendations published by ITU-T.

My research focuses on the Industrial Internet of things (IIoT)/Cyber Physical Systems Security Modelling, IoT-enabled Context-aware data processing, Semantic reasoning, and Artificial Intelligence. Additionally, I am the editorial board member of Progress in Human Computer Interaction Journal, Managing Guest Editor for special issue on “Role of Disruptive Technologies in Modern Distribution Grid Automation” in Sustainable Energy Technologies and Assessments Journal and I regularly review articles for IEEE Transactions on Industrial Informatics, IEEE Transactions on Network Science and Engineering, IEEE Transactions on Computational Social Systems, IEEE Sensors Journal, Future Generation Computer System (FGCS), and other IEEE and Springer Q1 journals. I have also served as a reviewer and TPC of various domestic and international conferences such as IEEE WCNC 2020-Workshop.
